title: First post !!!
content: Welcome to the blog! Dont expect me to post here often.

title: uhhh, pico computer?
content: I just ran CP/M on my raspberry pi pico. It works, but its PAINFULLY SLOW. Still counts as a $2 computer though.

title: my favourite websites
content: Here are my top 5 favourite websites: 1: neal.fun - awesome games and stuff 2: classic.minecraft.net - classic minecraft in a browser 3: botland.com - electronics parts because yes 4: github.com - well, GITHUB 5: crazygames.com - free games in a browser
